boardGUI

Class BoardPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • boardGUI.BoardPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BattleshipListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BoardPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements BattleshipListener
    Visual representation of a BattleshipBoard which extends JPanel

    Allows for varying amounts of BoardSquares and has a scale attribute which determines how large each BoardSquare should be painted.

    Since:
    2015-09-24
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Jason Carlson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                  int s,

        Parameters:
        gs - The gridSize should be equal to a (@link BattleshipBoard}
        s - The scale of each BoardSquare in pixels.
        cs - A ColorScheme describing the colors of the board.

      • squareAt

        public BoardSquare squareAt(int x,
                            int y)
        Gets a BoardSquare by relative pixel location.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the pixel which was clicked in relation to the top-left of this component.
        y - y-coordinate of the pixel which was clicked in relation to the top-left of this component.
        Returns:
        the BoardSquare which was clicked.

      • squareAtGrid

        public BoardSquare squareAtGrid(int r,
                                int c)
        Gets a BoardSquare by logical board location.
        Parameters:
        r - row of the grid to get the square in relation to the top-left of this component.
        c - column of the grid to get the square in relation to the top-left of this component.
        Returns:
        the BoardSquare which was clicked.

      • setVisibleShips

        public void setVisibleShips(boolean s)

      • shotFired

        public void shotFired(BattleshipEvent e)
        shotFired method required by BattleshipListener Interface.

        Lets the appropriate BoardSquare know it was fired at, and the status of that shot, so it can change color if needed.

        Specified by:
        shotFired in interface BattleshipListener
        Parameters:
        e - A BattleshipEvent which will contain the code for HIT, MISS, or INVALID and possibly SHIP_SUNK. Will contain row and col and if SHIP_SUNK will contain the sunken Ship.
        See Also:
        BattleshipListener.shotFired(boardAPI.battleshipInterface.BattleshipEvent)

      • gameOver

        public void gameOver(BattleshipEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: BattleshipListener
        Method called when the game is over (all ships sunk).
        Specified by:
        gameOver in interface BattleshipListener
        Parameters:
        e - A BattleshipEvent which will contain the code for GAME_OVER.

      • shipMoved

        public void shipMoved(BattleshipEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: BattleshipListener
        Method called when a ship is moved or placed. If moved, will have prevShip where the ship used to be and ship where it is now. If placed for the first time, prevShip will be null.
        Specified by:
        shipMoved in interface BattleshipListener
        Parameters:
        e - A BattleshipEvent which will contain the code for SHIP_MOVED and the Ship.
